post:
Hello people , 

Like i have promised many times we have start to offer kvm storage plans , so to celebrate this   new offer **we give 30% off recurring for life in all order with minimum 3 month prepayment contract recurring for life** .**  **Cupon code : kvm30off**

Vztype : KVM

1gb ram

normal price 6.5 eur/mo , after disscount if you pay quarently will be 4.55 eur/mo so a totaly of 13.65 eur/3 month.
Link to buy : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=393



If you need bigger plans you can visit this webage using the same cupon: https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?gid=54


For the moment we offer only the template what is in the list , but we are working hard to add more templates including some windows. This will tard up to 4-6 business day.


PLEASE NOTE : THIS IS A LIMITED OFFER , SO THE COUPON CODE IS VALID UP TO DAY 30.07.2019 OR UNTIL 1000 COUPONS IS CONSUME. AFTER THIS THE NORMAL RATES WILL BE APPLY.
Also if is huge demands we can delay in provide your service up to the day 16.07.2019 so please be patciense . Once the service is delivered we will change your next due date if is the case.


Any question ? feel free to ask here.
